system.description:
Racial Traits

  • Forest elves receive the extra feat Archaic Weapon Proficiency (Bows), at 1st level for free.
  • Forest elves possess Low-Light Vision, allowing them to see twice as far as normal in poor lightning conditions, as well as distinguish colors, even in dim lighting.
  • Forest elves can choose between Archaic Weapon Proficiency (Any) or Exotic Melee Weapons Proficiency (Any Two), at 1st level for free.
  • Forest elves have Sidhe as their native language, and receive Trade Bant Simplified as a secondary language.

Racial Traits (Active Effect)

  • Forest elves are Medium sized creatures.
  • Forest elves have a Mental Limit equal to ((6+WIS Score)×CL) + 30.
  • Forest elves receive a −3 Racial Recoil Penalty to recoil when using any weapon that has recoil.
  • Forest elves have a base Combat Point score of 17.
  • Forest elves CHP formula is CON Score -1.

Physical Description

A healthy forest elf typically stands between 5-5½’, and weighs between 130-185 lbs. The men are usually taller than the women. Elves have slightly pointed ears, that they often decorate with jewelry and piercings. Forest elven skin tone ranges from a mid olive to a dark tan, and their hair ranges from light brown to a dark brown, usually in a long straight texture. The average elven lifespan is 160 years, reaching physical adulthood between the ages of 20-27.

Language

The native language of a forest elf is Sidhe.

Names

Forest elven names are similar to human names with a family name and a given name, but they almost always have some kind of given identifier that notes one or two outstanding traits of the person. This name is almost always in Sidhe.
